Redemption SpauldersLevel 60

Commander Eligor Dawnbringer at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a pair of Redemption Spaulders if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Spaulders, 12 Wartorn Plate Scraps, 2 Arcanite Bars and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Spaulders
- Wartorn Plate Scrap x 12
- Arcanite Bar x 2
- Nexus Crystal x 2
